messages.content: Answer exclusively in this JSON format: {'$defs': {'CompletionMetadata': {'additionalProperties': False, 'description': 'Model for completion metadata', 'properties': {'model': {'description': 'Model identifier', 'title': 'Model', 'type': 'string'}, 'tokens_used': {'description': 'Token count', 'title': 'Tokens Used', 'type': 'integer'}, 'processing_time': {'description': 'Processing time in seconds', 'title': 'Processing Time', 'type': 'number'}}, 'required': ['model', 'tokens_used', 'processing_time'], 'title': 'CompletionMetadata', 'type': 'object'}}, 'additionalProperties': False, 'description': 'Standard structured output', 'properties': {'text': {'description': 'Generated text content', 'title': 'Text', 'type': 'string'}, 'metadata': {'$ref': '#/$defs/CompletionMetadata'}}, 'required': ['text', 'metadata'], 'title': 'StructuredOutput', 'type': 'object'}
